text: I hope you're enjoying looking at many kinds of Japanese sweets and snacks.
Now, which do you think the Japanese usually eat?
I asked around to see what the most popular sweets and snacks in Japan are.
Now, let's go back to Tokyo Okashi Land and look at more delicious sweets and snacks!
Do you get any visitors from overseas?
I understand some of Glico-ya Kitchen's items are tax-free.
I think I bought too many to take home!
But Chef loves sweets, so she'll be happy!
I must go now. Chef is waiting for me!
